mapper.update: UPDATE rb_user_feedback SET reply_content = #{dto.replyContent}, reply_img = #{dto.replyImg}, status = 1 WHERE id = #{dto.id}
mapper.select: SELECT uf.id, uf.user_id, ru.user_name as userName, ru.wechat, ru.phone_number as phoneNumber, uf.feedback_content, uf.feedback_img AS feedbackImgStr, uf.feedback_time, uf.feedback_count, uf.status, uf.reply_content, uf.reply_img FROM rb_user_feedback uf LEFT JOIN rb_user ru ON uf.user_id = ru.id WHERE uf.id = #{id}
